1601080.name: King of Heroes
1601080.description:
## UPDATE ##

Unfortunately, we are shutting down King of Heroes. Thank you all so much for your support! We hope to create another game for you someday!

####

Follow our hero on his treacherous adventure tackling on a multitude of obstacles and battling strange and scary monsters. A new and interactive card-based strategy game!

Using an innovative four-slot system, plan your moves ahead of time. Figure out your enemies' attack patterns and take them out!

Each unit has their own special skills! Will you play as the tough and hardy warrior, Hiro? Or the magical wizard Aria? Discover the secret behind the King of Heroes!
1601080.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
